sentences.sContent: We ate a Greek salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, loads of olives and seaweed; a stir-fry of vegetables with tofu and a miso and cashew sauce; and a mound of quinoa.
sentences.sCn: 我们就着希腊沙拉吃了黄瓜、土豆还有许多橄榄和海带；用蔬菜、豆腐配以日本豆面酱、腰果酱炒的菜；还有一堆奎奴亚藜。

trans.tranOther: to cook small pieces of food quickly by moving them around continuously in very hot oil
